DOC.detailed_description: We propose conduct prospective , single-center , open-label , single-arm study compare tolerability Acthar versus oral prednisone treatment MS relapse . Potential subject identify routine clinical evaluation . If patient determine study-defined MS relapse , invite participate study . After consent obtain , patient complete first page ARMS survey . If prior steroid use deem tolerable first page ARMS collect analyzed patient complete participation trial . Their data ARMS provide estimate number patient self-report tolerability efficacy issue steroid . However , patient self-report prior steroid intolerability , advance Acthar treatment arm trial .
